00035 class Path : public boost::filesystem::path {
00036   typedef boost::filesystem::path Parent;
00037 public:
00038   Path() { }
00039   Path(const String &s) : Parent(s) { }
00040   Path(const char *s) : Parent(s) { }
00041   Path(const Parent &path) : Parent(path) { }
00042 
00043   Path &operator=(const Parent &path) {
00044     Parent::operator=(path);
00045     return *this;
00046   }
00047 
00048 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103600
00049   bool has_parent_path() const { return has_branch_path(); }

00051   String filename() const { return leaf(); }
00052 #endif
